key:
[ ğŸ”‘ ] Skeleton key for Level Moderators ```emoji: :key:
description:
Pushes the reacted message past the bot's rules, very powerful and dangerous

:key: a message in #tmt-feedback, and TMTmachine will ignore the !<review> command requirement - though the message must have a <world-course> in it

:key: used in #tmt-level-codes will reset the reactions on the message - and should allow any lvl Mod to bypass the "The reaction must be given by the message author" rule

:key: on an course in #emt-codes will push that course into #emt-final-review, regardless of how many :heart:s it has.```
